statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, product_category, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND total_purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date DESC

SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-05-01' AND purchase_date <= '2021-06-30' AND product_category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') ORDER BY customer_id DESC, purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, predicted_purchase_date FROM predicted_buying_behavior ORDER BY predicted_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM predicted_buying_behavior;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, predicted_purchase_date FROM predicted_buying_behavior WHERE predicted_purchase_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) as max_amount, MIN(purchase_amount) as min_amount FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history JOIN predicted_buying_behavior ON customer_purchase_history.customer_id = predicted_buying_behavior.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, item_name, item_price FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'a3f6b9e0-955d-4fc7-82ac-dc40c1a0fa32';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, purchases.item_name, purchases.item_price * purchases.quantity AS total_price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.item_name, predictions.predicted_behavior FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN predictions ON customers.customer_id = predictions.customer_id ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC, purchases.item_name DESC, predictions.predicted_behavior ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, prediction_date, predicted_purchase_amount FROM PredictiveAnalytics ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM CustomerDetails JOIN PurchaseHistory ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(predicted_purchase_amount) AS avg_prediction FROM PredictiveAnalytics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_prediction > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, product_category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount >= 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
